content.rendered:
Nanshan Jet headquarters locates in yantai, shandong province, and has branch office in Beijing, Shanghai, Hong Kong. Nanshan Jet offers a series of services such as charter services, aviation consultation, aircraft management (including overseas aircraft management), ground handling and aircraft maintenance.

 

 

Nanshan Jet in Yantai, China Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: No.7 Yingbing Road, Yantai Penglai International Airport, Shandong Province, China

Phone: 865356299731

Branch Office Address in Beijing
Address: 2th Floor, Zhaojin Plaza, No.2 East Beijing Capital International Airport Road, Beijing, China

Phone: 86108416646

Branch Office Address in Shanghai
Address: 5E Building V1, No.2545 Hongqiao Road, Changning District, Shanghai, China

Phone: 02167337169, 8602167337

Branch Office Address in Hong Kong
Address: Room B，Floor 3, Taida International Tower, No.87 Yongle Road, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

Phone: 021 6733 7169
24hours hot-line: 400 0277 666

Email: sales@nanshanjet.com

Nanshan Jet Official website: http://en.nanshanjet.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Nanshan Jet

  • Gulfstream G450 B8155
  • Gulfstream G450 B8271
  • Gulfstream G450
  • Gulfstream G550
  • Gulfstream G650ER
  • Boeing Business jets BBJ
  • Challenger 605
  • Gulfstream G450 B8161

Queries handled by Nanshan Jet Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Nanshan Jet in Yantai, China Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Nanshan Jet in Yantai, China: (click on the stars below)
